definition: variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
pediatrics/pediatric (department)/sth of little importance/trifle/a child's play/(slang) childish/petty/stingy
variant of 小兒麻痺|小儿麻痹/infantile paralysis/polio (poliomyelitis)
Xiao'erjing, refers to the use of the Arabic alphabet to write Chinese

pinyin: xiao3 er2 ma2 bi4 bing4 du2

definition: erhua variant of 起小[qi3 xiao3]
erhua variant of 髮小|发小[fa4 xiao3]

sentences.english: A novel infantile enemator belongs to the technical field of medical equipment.
sentences.chinese: 新型小儿灌肠器，属于医疗用具技术领域。

sentences.english: Temperature taking is intrusive and will upset the child.
sentences.chinese: 测量体温是对小儿烦扰，会使小儿不安。

sentences.english: Temperature taking is intrusive and will upset the child.
sentences.chinese: 测量体温是对小儿烦扰，会使小儿不安。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo find out the cause and actualities of pre-hospital care of pedo-burn.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解小儿烧伤的致伤因素和院前急救现状。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical effects of KeAn buccal tablets in treating childrens MP pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察咳安含片治疗小儿支原体肺炎的临床作用。

sentences.english: Conclusion Air enema is the best methods in treat and diagnose infant intussusception.
sentences.chinese: 结论空气灌肠是诊断与治疗小儿肠套叠的最好方法。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the long term curative effect of surgical treatment for concomitant esotropia of children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨手术矫正小儿共同性内斜视的远期疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the related clinical factors of child brain atrophy.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究小儿脑萎缩的临床相关因素。

sentences.english: The utility model provides a novel infant enema fixer, belonging to the medical treatment tool technical field.
sentences.chinese: 新型小儿灌肠固定器，属于医疗用具技术领域。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the clinical characteristics and treatment of rare types of pheochromocytoma in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨小儿特殊嗜铬细胞瘤的临床特点及治疗。

sentences.english: Demonstrate ability to direct pediatric trauma resuscitations.
sentences.chinese: 有能处小儿科创伤的救护。

sentences.english: To explore the value of electroencephalogram(EEG) after depriving sleep in the diagnosis of epilepsy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨剥夺睡眠脑电图在小儿癫痫诊断中的价值。

sentences.english: My little son nipped in with a smart question.
sentences.chinese: 我的小儿子插话问了一个俏皮的问题。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the curative effect of children bacterial diarrhea treated with ceftriaxone sodium.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察头孢曲松钠治疗小儿细菌性腹泻病疗效。

sentences.english: Conclusion Qingjinzhike - soup has better therapeutic efficacy on coughing due to wind - heat in children.
sentences.chinese: 结论清金止咳汤治疗小儿外感风热咳嗽具有良好效果。

sentences.english: It is indicated that childhood asthma should be treated through phlegm and blood-stasis.
sentences.chinese: 小儿哮喘应从痰瘀论治，以化痰通瘀为治则。

definition: (of food) to retain in stomach due to indigestion (TCM)
throat sound such as choking, donkey's bray etc
